titleStmt.title: Sugli dei, sui sacrifici e sul fato

Submit - This papyrus has been digitally edited by Niccolò Petronio during a workshop organized at the University of Florence by Valeria Piano (Univ. of Florence) with James Cowey (instructor; Univ. of Heidelberg) and Claudio Vergara (assistant; Univ. of Naples Federico II) within the project PRIN2022-INTEGRATION. INTEllectual miGRATION: circulation of philosophical books and ideas around the ancient Mediterranean through the evidence of Graeco-Roman papyri (CUP: B53D23023140006; P.I. Valeria Piano)
